turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What type of drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I had the Black and White Mocha the other day. Do they still have that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, it's a seasonal offering, but is still available. What size of drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I've got a long meeting this afternoon, so we better make it a Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What type of milk do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I like the whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Do you want the whipped cream topping on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks, I don't really care for that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you need to order any food or anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I think I just need the coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Which store would you like me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll be pretty close to the Circle Tower Starbucks in Indianapolis.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Is there anything else that you'd like from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Not that I can think of.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. This order will be automatically charged to your card.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. When will it be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will take about 15 minutes for the order to be ready.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect! Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome. A receipt will be texted to you shortly, and you should be able to just pick up your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Goodbye.
